verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:1
verses.text: Moreover, brethren, I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you, which also ye have received, and wherein ye stand;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:2
verses.text: By which also ye are saved, if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you, unless ye have believed in vain.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:3
verses.text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received, how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:4
verses.text: And that he was buried, and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:5
verses.text: And that he was seen of Cephas, then of the twelve:
